mapper.select: INSERT INTO Book ( ISBN_ISSN, SCHOOL_CODE, CENTER_CONTROL_NO, CONTROL_NO, HOLDING_SEQ, BARCODE_STRING, BARCODE_NUMBER, BARCODE, PRINT_BARCODE, TITLE, AUTHOR, PUBLISHER, PUBBLISHER_YEAR, CALL_NO, APART_CODE, CLASSIFY_NO, AUTHOR_NO, VOLUME, COPY_NO, LOCATION_SEQ, DATA_GROUP_SEQ, ACQUISITION_TYPE, DATA_STATE, INVENTORY_STATE, DONOR_NAME, CHECKIN_SEQ, INPUT_DATE, INPUT_NAME, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_NAME, DISCARD_DATE, DATA_TYPE, VOLUME_TITLE, BOOK_STATUS) VALUES ( #{isbn1}, null, null, null, null, #{BARCODE_STRING}, #{BARCODE_NUMBER}, null, null, #{TITLE1}, #{AUTHOR1}, #{PUBLISHER1}, #{PUBBLISHER_YEAR1}, null, #{APART_CODE}, #{CLASSIFY_NO}, #{AUTHOR_NO}, #{VOLUME}, #{COPY_NO}, null, null, null, null, null, #{DONOR_NAME}, null, now(), #{INPUT_NAME}, now(), #{UPDATE_NAME}, null, null, null, null)
